tool_description: This API shows the live sport news from germany. Diese API zeigt die Sportnachrichten live aus Deutschland.
name: Sport News Live
title: Sport News Live

api_list.name: Get specific sport news source
api_list.description: This endpoind gets a specific newsfeed from germany.

api_list.name: Get generell sport news source
api_list.description: This endpoind gets the overall newsfeeds from german sport news.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sport-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com/sport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sport-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sport-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com/sport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sport-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
